column4: Ok, how do i format a removable disk so i dont have any problems with it?
what kind of problems have you been having?

well, ive been adding and deleting some movie clips to a microsd card for my phone. it was all good till it says ready only now. i tried another microsd and still got the same error. what is going on?please help
but five minutes ago i was able to add and delete files from it
is it your phone saying it's read only or your computer?
give me a minute or two
also, how do i get my removable storage to be regonized ? With my storage in my phone,and my phone connected to my computer
what is it you're doing when you get the message about something being read-only?
are you unmounting the memory card before you eject it?
WOW seems like Ubuntu has a HUGE bug.Sucks
found a couple articles which might be helpful: https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+question/25632 https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+question/25575
